item.title: Busan Film Festival to Honor Jafar Panahi as Asian Filmmaker of the Year
item.description: The Busan award follows Panahi’s historic Palme d’Or win at Cannes in May for ‘It Was Just an Accident’ and caps a career defined by artistic resistance and critical acclaim.
